typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		skills as string[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Emp
Flatten2 foldDown(skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Emp foldDown(skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
